channel.title: Office on 打工笔记
channel.description: Recent content in Office on 打工笔记

item.title: 修复Office文件默认图标
item.description: 修复office文件默认图标 rem 修复office文件默认图标.bat :: office图标文件路径，请根据自己电脑上的安装目录设置 set officepath=C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\vfs\Windows\Installer\{90160000-000F-0000-1000-0000000FF1CE}\ :: 修复word图标 reg add "HKCR\Word.Document.8\DefaultIcon" /ve /t REG_SZ /d "%officepath%WORDICON.EXE,1" reg delete "HKCR\Word.
